author: Josephson
content: Bullish: MSFT high target price $600; average target $504.77; MSFT is far under-valued. Most analysts rated MSFT Strong Buy. Be patient. Don't sell. Or else, buy MSFT $470 by the year end

author: Ick
content: Bullish: when they ask me what I am grateful for this Thursday I'll reply Trump and MSFT..🦃 🟢

author: Zach
content: The MSFT shorts have officially gone into hysteria mode.  You know this because they have started coming on this board to try to jawbone MSFT lower after several straight green days.

author: Lukas
content: Bullish: This just passed multiple support levels. It looks like it’s rearing for a fat jump.

author: Joe
content: Bearish: Mexican president issues warning that Mexico will meet trumps tariffs with tariffs against US imports to Mexico. Here for the chaos.

author: Lanar
content: Thanksgiving boost for softie with good tidings for a prosperous 2025.

author: Nicholas
content: Bearish: MSFT at Death Cross. Last time this happened was March ‘22. Get ready to buy this dip

author: Ed
content: Bearish: I’m concerned there could be heavy selling at the first of the year on Microsoft. A lot of long-term holders may be holding on because they don’t want to pay capital gains tax this year. I can see them selling at the beginning of the year heading for better opportunities.

author: Danny
content: msft death cross.. is it bearish now?
